Description: From live to on-demand, SpotMe makes it easy to deliver digital experiences and event apps that your audience love.
Name: SpotMe

Methods.Name: List Sessions
Methods.Description: Retrieves all sessions, optionally filtered to only those created since the specified date.

Methods.Name: List New Sessions
Methods.Description: Retrieves sessions created since the last time this process was executed.

Methods.Name: Get Session
Methods.Description: Retrieves a session by ID.

Methods.Name: Upsert Session
Methods.Description: If a Session ID is provided, the existing session will be updated. Otherwise a new session will be created.

Methods.Name: Delete Session
Methods.Description: Deletes a session.

Methods.Name: Upsert Tag
Methods.Description: If a Tag ID is provided, the existing tag will be updated. Otherwise a new tag will be created. Tags, by Tag ID, can then be added to a session using the Upsert Session method.

Methods.Name: List Session Tags
Methods.Description: Retrieves all tags for a session, optionally filtered to only those created since the specified date.

Methods.Name: List New Session Tags
Methods.Description: Retrieves a session's tags created since the last time this process was executed.

Methods.Name: Get Registration
Methods.Description: Retrieves a registration by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Registrations
Methods.Description: Retrieves a session's registrations created since the last time this process was executed.

Methods.Name: List Registrations
Methods.Description: Retrieves all registrations for a session, optionally filtered to only those created since the specified date.

Methods.Name: Upsert Registration
Methods.Description: If a Registration ID is provided, the existing registration will be updated. Otherwise a new registration, a user being registered to a session, will be created.

Methods.Name: Delete Registration
Methods.Description: Deletes a registration to a session.

Methods.Name: Get Form
Methods.Description: Retrieves a form by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Forms
Methods.Description: Retrieves forms created since the last time this process was executed.

Methods.Name: List Forms
Methods.Description: Retrieves all forms, optionally filtered to only those created since the specified date.

Methods.Name: Upsert Speaker
Methods.Description: If a Speaker ID is provided, the existing speaker will be updated. Otherwise a new speaker will be created.

Methods.Name: List New Speakers
Methods.Description: Retrieves speakers created since the last time this process was executed.

Methods.Name: Get Speaker
Methods.Description: Retrieves a speaker by ID.

Methods.Name: Upload Speaker Photo
Methods.Description: Upload a photo for a speaker.

Methods.Name: List Speakers
Methods.Description: Retrieves all speakers, optionally filtered to only those created since the specified date.

Methods.Name: Get Speaker Photo
Methods.Description: Retrieves a speaker photo by ID.

Methods.Name: Delete Speaker
Methods.Description: Deletes a speaker.

Methods.Name: Delete User
Methods.Description: Deletes a user, giving them a status of 'Cancelled'.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Retrieves all users, optionally filtered to only those created since the specified date.

Methods.Name: List New Users
Methods.Description: Retrieves users created since the last time this process was executed.

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Retrieves a user by ID.

Methods.Name: Upsert User
Methods.Description: If a User ID is provided, the existing user will be updated. Otherwise a new user will be created.

Methods.Name: List New Form Responses
Methods.Description: Retrieves a form's responses created since the last time this process was executed.

Methods.Name: List Form Responses
Methods.Description: Retrieves all responses to a form, optionally filtered to only those created since the specified date.

Methods.Name: Get Form Response
Methods.Description: Retrieves a form response by ID.
